1.6.1.name: wordpress/shockingly-simple-favicon
1.6.1.description:
The "Shockingly Simple Favicon" changes the favicon of your blog without having to edit the theme files, and put a WordPress icon in the admin interface, so you can easily spot the admin tab in your browser.

This changes are fixed so you dont have to mess with theme code everytime you change theme.

See the new Shockingly Simple Favicon homepage for further information.

Thanks for everyones suggestions!

Localizations

  • Russian (be_BY) by Fat Cow
